title: Almost Death
author: matty
citation: matty. "Almost Death: experience with Fentanyl (ID 46174)". Erowid.org. Feb 11, 2008. erowid.org/exp/46174
report:
[Erowid Note: No contact information was provided with this report, so we are unable to confirm it or follow up with the author. It is our policy to try to verify any life-endangering adverse reactions which people report, where possible. If the author reads this, please contact admin@erowid.org.]

I suggest being very careful when doing this. Actually I do not recomend it at all. I got a 50mcg Fentanyl patch. Put it on my toungue, got the whole dose at once. Got an Extremely nice high. Body...mindeverything.

I get to my house... then the next thing I know paramedics are all around me and my dad is shaking me. Apparently I stopped breathing and was almost dead the EMT said. Other people had experiences like this one also so I have read. People please be carefull doses of Fentanyl are VERY strong when you put the patch in your mouth. fuckin A
